MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES

SPECIAL INVESTIGATION REPORT
202300000245
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB520201043

Agency Name: CHILD & FAMILY SERVICES OF THE
UPPER PENINSUL
Agency Address: 706 CHIPPEWA SQ
MARQUETTE, MI 49855-4834
License Status: Regular
License Expiration Date: 04/14/2024
Capacity: NA
II. METHODOLOGY
Contact Date Contact With: Contact Contact
Method Purpose
02/21/23 Chief Face to Face Interviews
Administrator,
Foster care team
III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code & CPA Rule 400.12417
Section (1) An agency shall provide a foster parent with all of the following
Description information before the placement or replacement of a child:
(a) Child’s name.
Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation Alleged that FP did not receive all information of child placed in
her home.
1

Investigation The Chief Administrator and foster care team were
interviewed face to face on February 21, 2023. The Chief
Administrator reported that the agency did not have foster
care case responsibilities for the child when the child was
placed in the foster home.
Document Review: A review of the case file in MISACWIS
confirmed that the agency did not have case responsibilities
for the child when she was placed in the foster home.
Analysis The agency did not have case responsibilities when the child
was placed in the foster home. Other concerns contained in
the complaint were outside the scope of DCWL.
Conclusion Violation Not Established
IV. RECOMMENDATION
The recommendation is for continuance of the regular license.
April 21, 2023
